name: Doyon @Ignister
description: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "@Ignister" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Link Summon of a Cyberse monster: You can target 1 "A.I." Spell/Trap in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Doyon @Ignister" once per turn.
